rule: The output must always consist of only one word, which represents a valid part-of-speech tag from the provided alphabetical list or one of the accepted non-list options, "Unknown" or "CantAnswer".
complianceText:
The chatbot output consists of a single part-of-speech tag, 'NN', which is present in the list of tags provided in the description. Also, the output consists of only the tag as described in the instructions.
OK
